thoughts: Is watching over the kits
Begrudingly allows kits to play with their tail
Goes to help a kit that stumbled over their own paws
Was roped into playing mossball with the kits
Somehow has a gaggle of kits following them
Is being begged by r_c to teach them a few moves, despite r_c being a kit
Somehow got roped up in watching r_c for the day
Theatrically dies after r_c slews them
Has to pretend to be a captured warrior for r_c's games
Is prentending to be a big, evil warrior for r_c
Wonders if r_c would have been their apprentice once they reached 6 moons
Ponders what r_c's favorite game would have been
Is listening to r_c's favorite games from their friends
wonders what type of apprentice r_c would've been
Listens to other kits sadly talk about r_c's death
Sadly remembers when r_c would play games with them
Hopes the kits in Starclan are safe
Wonders how r_c deals with being in the Dark Forest
Wishes that r_c may walk among the stars
Excitedly plays games with r_c, letting them win every time
Is woken up by r_c jumping on them, begging for something
Grooms r_c clean and makes them presentable
Carries r_c to the nursery because they fell asleep
Is scolding r_c for almost being reckless
Hopes their kits arent getting into too much trouble
Is in awe with how fast r_c is growing
Has the apprentices very engaged in a very, very tall tale
Wants to be chosen as the new deputy
Tries to set a good example for younger cats
Plans to visit the medicine cat
Is helping to escort the medicine cat to gather herbs
Is sparring with some Clanmates
